reviews.review: ผีเล่นยากครับ จู๊คมันมากเลย><

Ну что сказать, наиграл 70 часов. Куплены почти все маны. Ну и вот за все это время мне писали, что хорошо тунелю и фэйскэмплю. Чтобы избежать этого не играйте на манах, а еще в принципе можно не играть и на сурвах. В целом не жалею потраченного времени в этой игре.
Прикольная игра, но баланс надо менять, 4 радужный ранг против 4 пепла. Маньяки прикольные, но надо учиться играть (на некоторых)

I can not explain the feeling of pure rage when I get camped by the killer, or when my team just leaves me to die. Do I have fun when I play this game? Not at all. Why am I still playing? No clue. Do I recommend yes, it probably knocks a few years off my life everytime I play it.

Edit: Now that MMR has been in the game for some time the data the devs are gathering is finally correct. Now it's all up to the design team to finally implement the changes the data has been telling the too; after years of stagnation the game finally looks like its headed in the right direction. New players I would advise to either start now or during the sixth anniversary event. Veterans may want to wait until the anniversary itself. For now the game is moving a newer healthy direction, but if the design changes lackluster or fail I will change me review back to negative.

There's just no point anymore. It's not a bad thing to want to balance a game competitively, its beneficial for new players and veterans so that everyone is on the same playing field skill wise. Though, when you put in MMR you need to make steadfast balance changes. BHVR has done nothing to improve the game balance wise in any meaningful way: the maps are still terrible(made worse by their reworks), Blight and Nurse are the only consistent killers out of a roster of 20+, 95% of perks for both sides in this game achieve nothing they just exist in the slot, cheaters are beginning to swell across ranks. Overall, this game is going to die because of BHVR's own arrogance and laziness; too arrogant to admit when they mess up and also admit they have a cheating problem, too lazy to have meaningful events or make the correct balance changes that are also to scale of the issue they are meant to solve. If you are thinking about purchasing Dead by Daylight right now I implore you not to the game just is not playable in its current state, maybe later if you find out they game has gone through meaningful changes. It's tragic, the fundamental principal of Dead by Daylight is perfect, but just like every other game that has come out in the past 5 or so years the developers just keep ruining them with their poor judgment and their awful decision making process.

The game is fun but it was way more fun before the new MMR system. Now almost every killer slugs, camps and tunnels and survivors don't help eachother as much as before. And I for one started getting teammates that have 3 hrs in the game, even when I'm rank 1 (which doesn't matter) because I always sacrifice myself in order to save my teammates, and it really isn't fun when your teammates don't even know how to rescue you from the hook or hit a skillcheck.
Addictive game! Very fun if you want to pull an all nighter, but don't have the willpower. Play survivor and you won't sleep. :)
